Name: Handy Dandy
About the game: The two curious cave adventurers Handy and Dandy have accidentally caused an inter-dimensional tear which is now not only separating them, but the entire cave that they have to progress through to make things right and come together again in this 2D puzzle solving coop game. Work as one to bring your characters back together, unite their world and stand strong against all the treacheries and puzzles of the cave. Handy and Dandy will be thankfull, and if they had arms they would surely give you a hug. But they don't, so they can't. - Test your friendship (and patience) - Over 40 levels, 2 dimensions and 1 barrier - Over 1h of fun
